title: Coaching Program for Enhancing Higher Education Teaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic teaching experience and expertise in language education
context.additional_context: Acquiring practical coaching skills through project execution and feedback focused on real-world teaching methodologies for adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can provide specific and timely feedback on peers' instructional design and implementation processes by applying a coaching model.
Learners can systematically design the educational objectives-assessment-coaching process for language education projects in a PBL environment.
Learners can develop a teaching competency evaluation framework linked to institutional goals and propose implementation plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
